Future Features

0 points

  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
0.00 from 0 votes

Created: Mar. 24th, 2010

We have a lot of ideas about what new features Lis

Tags:

Maybe

  • Collaborative lists

    This would give you the ability to invite other List Central users to contribute to your list(s).

  • Move a list item to another list
  • List archives

    This would work much like archiving emails in gmail. You can archive a list which would remove it from your main lists navigation. You can retrive the list via search or by tag.

  • Favourite lists

    A means to bookmark other people's lists by marking them as a favourite. You would have access to the lists your favourite via a personalized listing.

  • RSS feed

    Get the top lists of the day in your email or feed reader.

  • List group listing

    A listing of all your lists within a list group. This would be useful if built in conjunction with archive lists.

  • List Central iPhone up
  • Forum

    A place to chat with other list makers, a web forum, integrated into List Central.

  • Auto link creation

    When  you enter a link that starts with http:// or https:// as a list item, or in a description, List Central automaticall turns it into a web link.
